tool_description: Compares candidate salary expectations against job budget ranges, calculating compatibility scores and negotiation potential.
error_messages: Invalid salary values: All salary amounts must be positive numbers
Invalid salary range: candidate_min_salary must be <= candidate_max_salary if both provided
Invalid budget range: job_min_budget must be <= job_max_budget
Unsupported currency: Use standard 3-letter currency codes (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.)
usage: Provide candidate salary expectations and job budget range. The tool calculates compatibility and provides negotiation insights.

negotiation_potential.description: Assessment of negotiation possibility (high, medium, low, none)

gap_amount.description: Gap between expectations and budget if no overlap
